bibl.title: Eclectism and Atticism in the Textual Criticism of the Greek New Testament.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: On Language, Culture, and Religion in honor of Eugene A. Nida (The Hague - Paris, 1974) pp. 149-156.
bibl.seg: Martini Carlo Maria, Eclectism and Atticism in the Textual Criticism of the Greek New Testament.
La Parola di Dio alle origini della Chiesa. [Scripta Minora di Carlo Maria Martini] = Analecta Biblica. 93 (Roma, 1980) pp. 144-152.
